name: Mortal Kombat 3 Extra 60
overview: Mortal Kombat 3  Extra 60 is a bootleg port of Mortal Kombat II with several of the characters swapped out for a bunch of stages from Mortal Kombat 3. At least this game has the sewer level, unlike Hummer Team's version. The original game featured a versus screen before each fight, which was removed in Extra 60.
